title: Bloomberg Markets: Chaikin on Earnings Driven Bull Market
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chaikin on Earnings Driven Bull Market
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Marc Chaikin CEO/Founder Chaikin Analytics Discussing the markets and where he is seeing opportunity in stocks.
